 2024-09802024-08-28ESDC
ActPoverty Reduction Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIE ALICIA CHRISTIAN of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be a full-time member of the National Advisory Council on Poverty, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 15, 2024.
